name: dsalgo-playwright-bdd-framework
description: Playwright BDD Framework for DS Algo Portal Testing

scripts.test: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test
scripts.test:setup: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --project=setup
scripts.test:modules: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --project=modules
scripts.test:cleanup: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --project=cleanup
scripts.test:headed: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:ui: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:smoke: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --grep @smoke
scripts.test:regression: npm run bddgen && npx playwright test --grep @regression
scripts.test:allure: npm test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.clean: rm -rf reports/ test-results/ .auth/ playwright-report/ allure-report/ .features-gen/ allure-results/
scripts.clean:reports: rm -rf reports/ test-results/ playwright-report/ allure-report/ allure-results/
scripts.test:report: npm run clean:reports && npm test; npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:serve: npm run clean:reports && npm test; npx allure serve reports/allure-results
